name: papyrus-v6
description: Papyrus v6: Instant messaging - done right.
author: Jacob Sapoznikow <jacob1coder@gmail.com>

scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && yarn start" "cd server && yarn start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && yarn lint" "cd server && yarn lint"
scripts.build: cd client && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn build
